cpsr.environment.components

Class ResetActionObservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsr.environment.components.ActionObservation
      • cpsr.environment.components.ResetActionObservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ResetActionObservation
extends ActionObservation
    Class defines a general reset action observation. Users do not need to implement reset action observations but they are added to data set to facilitate learning.
    Author:
    William Hamilton
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
